title: Lulu Needs a VGU
body:
Don't get me wrong, Lulu is a very beloved character. The well-known loveable & somewhat crazy yordle. 

Her [splash](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_large/public/upload/art/bg_champion_lulu_1920x1080.jpg?itok=KsQJjjdj) is great, but... [that model...](http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/c/ca/Lulu_Render.png/revision/20140403100124) Lulu was introduced before Tristana's rework (March 2012 to be exact, where Tristana [was reworked](https://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-update/champion-update-tristana) from a megling to a yordle in early 2015, not to forget [Poppy's rework](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/champion-update-poppy-keeper-hammer) too), so... I refer to this time as the "Megling Era", when the Megling design was rampant on [Tristana](https://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/9/91/Tristana_OriginalSkin_old.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141014012025) & especially [Poppy](https://pm1.narvii.com/5945/d1c0824d60c042b412f89e74dacad5d7a87f693a_hq.jpg).
We can see in Lulu's model here with her small, elvish ears, & round face, & flat, round nose. & lack of furry appearance. 
Not only her face, but her body too. She has 5 fingers. Her arms are long & gaunt, her body very short. She looks more like a witch (like, humanish witch not a yordle). If we look at older skins, they sport a megling appearance. Like [Bittersweet Lulu](http://lolwp.com/wp-content/uploads/Bittersweet-Lulu.jpg) , in [fan arts](https://i.pinimg.com/736x/f6/9a/6d/f69a6d953f51e58c52c252e611cb35fc--candy-girls-sweet-treats.jpg) people make this skin look great & cute, but the model for the skin & the splash just don't match the concept of Lulu we now have (post-megling era). 

We can see Rito try to fix this with refreshed skins like [Dragon Trainer](https://pm1.narvii.com/6077/53fd0969d720bf06c669e98576317dbc831ab0e5_hq.jpg) & [Star Guardian](https://orig00.deviantart.net/857f/f/2016/281/1/b/star_guardian_lulu_by_missmaddytaylor-dak9osz.png) , See her newest SG skin, her ears are fluffy. (Unlike in her original)
& although the face is better, just the body is still gaunt & awkward, not yordle-like. 
I feel as though her entire model just needs to be re-done, at least the original (because the skins would be difficult, esp. with a fairly new skin out). The colours are obnoxious, as well. I don't particularly play her (but I am a yordle ambassador, I draw yordles & a Poppy main) so I don't know if it's worth the extent of a rework, but a serious VU, not just a retexture but a serious model change. Her stance, of being hunched over & awkward is alright but her proportions are just wrong. Gaunt.

**TL;DR :** _Lulu's original model is old & outdated, sporting a megling design, & needs to be completely re-done to fit the current design of a yordle._
